calc¶

bandcalc.lattice.calc.calc_bandstructure(k_points, lattice, N)¶

Calculate the band structure of a lattice along a given k path with N samples

Parameters

  • k_points (numpy.ndarray) – k points

  • lattice (numpy.ndarray) – reciprocal lattice

  • N (int) – number of samples

Return type

numpy.ndarray

bandcalc.lattice.calc.eps_0(k, G)¶

Calculate the unpertubated energy for given k vector and reciprocal lattice vector

Parameters

  • k (numpy.ndarray) – k vector of the particle

  • G (numpy.ndarray) – reciprocal lattice vector

Return type

float

bandcalc.lattice.calc.matrix(k, lattice)¶

Construct the hamiltonian for any given k in a specified lattice

Parameters

  • k (numpy.ndarray) – k vector of the particle

  • lattice (numpy.ndarray) – reciprocal lattice

Return type

numpy.ndarray
